channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Workflow for Bluemix
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Workflow for Bluemix

item.title: CVE-2015-0102|2024-08-06T03:55:28.003Z -- ibm -- workflow%20for%20bluemix
item.description: IBM Workflow for Bluemix does not set the secure flag for the session cookie in an https session, which makes it easier for remote attackers to capture this cookie by intercepting its transmission within an http session.
